programme.desc: Starcast-AmmyVirk, MandyTakhar, KulwinderBilla, SoniaKaur, KaramjitAnmol, SunilPuri, GuramritpalSingh, GurjitPalSingh

programme.title: Hausla
programme.desc: Danish, a village boy with kabaddi dreams, faces adversity as he's unfairly removed from his team due to a dispute he didn't start. Despite family discord, his father stands by him. A new opportunity arises, showcasing Danish's talent. He's selected for the biggest game of his life, but tragedy strikes: his father passes away. Will Danish find the strength to play on, honoring his father's memory?

programme.title: Hearts Awash In Sapphire Light
programme.desc: Hearts Awash in Sapphire Light unfolds the tale of two individuals who encounter each other one evening, initially under less-than-ideal circumstances. At first, they engage in petty arguments over trivial matters. However, as time passes, the undeniable power of their connection becomes evident, serving as a poignant reminder that sometimes, the most extraordinary journeys take place within the depths of our own hearts.

programme.title: Humraz
programme.desc: This is the story of a couple who tried to raise their voice against the undesirable practice of one community. Hamraz is a witness to the hero playing Ravanahatha and the incidents that happened to him... Sometimes the image that looks white is also black... Humraz is a story full of mysteries... The curtain will soon fall on all the secrets and the real story will come out in front of everyone..

programme.title: Jama Punji
programme.desc: A late night conversation between a mother (Sarla) & her son Anshuman, 13 days after the passing of his father where they discuss the reasons for his detachment with his father and how by the end of the night, certain events lead Anshuman to accept and make amends with his deceased father.

programme.title: Keep Punching
programme.desc: Prior to realising her dream of representing the country, withdrawn boxer Kirnay must first fight the battle for her freedom outside the ring.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Love has many things hidden instore. What happens and Why does it happen? The secrets will be revealed in Kidnapped

programme.title: Loha Chor
programme.desc: A modest family from Haryana relocated to Dhanbad, Bihar, and took up residence in a government quarter that had previously been inhabited by the notorious "Loha Chor" gang during the 1980s in Bihar. The family encountered numerous challenges and social difficulties from both the local neighbourhood inhabitants and the remnants of the Loha Chor gang. Subsequently, law enforcement authorities conducted a raid on the premises. Through determination and courage, both the family and the protagonist of this story effectively navigated the situation in order to resolve the issue and find a resolution.

programme.title: Mere Shohar Ki Begam
programme.desc: Javed already married but still he wants second marriage. His first wife Rukhsar opposed him, he beats her and second day he gets his second wife Afsana at home. Because of jealousy, bitterness revenge game starts between both wives.

programme.title: Meri Ramma Sabse Special
programme.desc: After a 15-year absence, Vikrant comes back home, only to be unexpectedly entangled in a web of unresolved issues and unspoken tensions with his mother. Confronting painful truths and reopening old wounds, he embarks on a quest for answers that could mend the fractured bonds between them. In this emotionally charged narrative, Vikrant must face his past to forge a brighter future and repair the ties strained by time.

programme.title: Naam Badal Dena
programme.desc: A couple who is head over heels in love with each other with a love that's extraordinary yet relatable. The wife is told by everyone that she is too trusting of her husband. The wife makes a pact with her husband that if she ever acts like an ordinary suspecting wife he can change her name. The universe then puts her to the test on their wedding anniversary. The husband then makes her admit her true feelings as a wife and believe that possessiveness and jealousy in moderation are good.

programme.title: Ode To The Nameless
programme.desc: A 24-year-old man, struggling with societal pressure to have his first intimate experience, decides to hire a companion. Contrary to his expectations, the encounter is awkward and guilt-ridden, leading to bouts of anxiety. Surprisingly, the woman, mature beyond her years, guides him with ease and grace, helping him realize that what he was searching for couldn't be found in just a few moments of pleasure.

programme.title: Oh My Star Wife
programme.desc: Story of a young married actress struggling with societal pressure over her fashion choices. Her husband's disapproval leads to arguments and a dilemma regarding societal acceptance. Ultimately, an unexpected accident brings resolution. Watch to explore how the protagonist navigates through societal expectations and challenges in her personal life.

programme.title: Parinay
programme.desc: The narrative explores our thought processes, whose opinions we value, and how we handle a common issue faced by many couples: when a minor disagreement escalates into a pointless argument.

programme.title: Dimming Shadows
programme.desc: The husband and wife both suffer from dementia, but with the help of a compassionate doctor and nurse, they make an effort to recover. Unfortunately, their attempts are unsuccessful, but their daughter finds solace in visualizing her parents as alive through virtual reality

programme.title: Kundli
programme.desc: Kundli - is a film about values in life, which change some decisions against the will of the characters. It's about two meetings of these characters in a different time period and shows the changes that have occurred in their lives. Though along with time things have changed but there are something’s which are unforgettable at the back of the mind. Kundli is a film about small things that have remained though the times have changed.

programme.title: Black Coffee
programme.desc: Film director Tara uncovers her sister Vanya's betrayal in a relationship and decides to take dramatic action. In a jaw-dropping twist, Tara stages their deaths in a short film. The lines between fiction and reality blur as Tara invites her real sister for coffee after the shoot, leaving the audience questioning what is real.

programme.title: Famous
programme.desc: Once a huge superstar now faded into oblivion, submerges himself into alcohol and drugs to escape reality. One day fate makes him meet his biggest fan in an unusual circumstance.

programme.title: French Date
programme.desc: Promila, a beautiful but lonely woman in a busy city, frequently on internet dating sites, meets Arun who's also stricken with a singlehood status for his whole life. As they both decide to spend some casual time together one evening. French Date, at first feels like a normal romantic story, which it is, but soon the viewer realizes something is different. The short film shall keep the grey matter in your brain active and you might find yourself on the edge of your seat.

programme.title: Juwaa
programme.desc: Tillu, a struggling villager, gambles his wife's mangalsutra for a shot at change. Against the odds, he wins—but discovers the real gamble is just beginning. A tale of hope, sacrifice, and the unexpected twists of life.

programme.title: Mestri
programme.desc: The man is displaying the behaviour of a thug. He receives calls similar to those of Abbas Khan. Along his journey, he follows a couple in their mid-twenties. Initially, they appear in Christian attire, then in Gujarati attire. Later, they appear in Muslim attire. one day the thug catches both of them. And he confronts them in front of Abbas Khan. At that time, there was a confrontation between the thug and Abbas Khan regarding money. At that time, the real story was revealed.

programme.title: Paath
programme.desc: In a remote village, the seed of hope and freedom is planted in the heart of a girl. Her simple dreams are shattered when a proposal arrives, but not as a promise of love

programme.title: The Footage
programme.desc: A spy dies in an elevator leaving a message on the CCTV footage. A lip-reader is called to find out what he said

programme.title: Vinyamswaha
programme.desc: You will take me for a ride in the sky, Vinay, when you become a pilot." These words have haunted Vinay throughout his life like a fearful shadow. Born into a Brahmin family, Vinay fell in love with a Valmiki girl. However, representatives of the caste-driven society, cloaked in prejudice, turned his love into a vile and grotesque joke. Today, Vinay is serving a life sentence for the rape and murder of his own girlfriend.

programme.title: Aplam Chaplam
programme.desc: Jayantika Sengupta: Rani Rahaao: Villain Zoya Sheikh: Child Sundeep Kumar: Son Vikar Tiwari: Friend of a son Sikandar Agarwal: Transgender

programme.title: Fear Of Wheels
programme.desc: This film beautifully captures the emotional interplay between the vibrant, ambitious youth and the helpless, world-weary elders, showcasing the poignant struggle between generations. As a person reaches a certain stage in life, they observe numerous things happening around them, yet feel incapable of taking action. Over time, they become reliant on others even for the most basic tasks. This narrative portrays those individuals who experience old age gradually tightening its grip around them.

programme.title: Karjdar Bhola
programme.desc: In a small village, Bhola and Komal, a struggling couple, face financial hardships. Bhola, a simple laborer, and Komal, his smart and beautiful wife, are burdened by a loan from Seth ji, a corrupt man who harasses Komal. Bhola mistakenly believes Komal is involved with Seth ji, leading to a deep misunderstanding. Eventually, the truth comes to light, allowing them to overcome their challenges and find happiness together.

programme.title: Meera
programme.desc: In this heartfelt story, a mother calls out to her daughter, only to be scolded by her husband. Her daughter, Meera, is a special child who cannot speak or hear, yet her mother sends her to school with hope. Despite the chaos and negativity around her, Meera remains blissfully unaware, finding beauty and positivity in everything. Her innocence and zest for life serve as a touching reminder of the purity within, even in a world filled with harsh words.

programme.title: Meri Bebbe
programme.desc: Based on true events, this poignant tale follows a young boy navigating life after losing his father and the unwavering efforts of his single mother to raise him against all odds.

programme.title: Panch Hazar
programme.desc: A young boy sneaks into a restricted area frequented by couples and men. He climbs the stairs, enters a room, and meets a beautiful girl. She asks him to close the door and confirm his payment. Their ensuing conversation serves as an eye-opener for men who mistreat their wives.

programme.title: Pintu
programme.desc: In a single day, young Pintu skips school, dreams of a better life inspired by a wealthy boy's shoes, and confronts the harsh realities of his underprivileged world, revealing his family's struggles and his own fragile hopes for the future.

programme.title: Ticket Please
programme.desc: Manohar Kadam, a voluntary retired man, tries hard to establish a meaningful connection with his only son Aditya but fails. Later he follows his friend Professor's advice and tries to connect with his son through a smartphone. The short film follows the Journey of Father and Son relationship in this Digital Era.

programme.title: Zindagi Ek Kashmakash
programme.desc: Zindagi Ek Kashmakash is a heart-wrenching story of a single mother, Rani, who has been abandoned by his boyfriend. Rani makes a living as a prostitute to support her only son, Ajay. Despite the harsh reality of her life, Rani is determined to provide a better future for Ajay. As Ajay grows older, he begins to worry that something is not quite right with his mother's job.

programme.title: Ae Ajnabi
programme.desc: Pappu, a misunderstood dreamer, carries a ring for the unknown—waiting for love, waiting for meaning. On a fateful night, he meets Chandini, a mysterious stranger who changes his world in just five hours. As they share stories, laughter, and heartbreak, Pappu finds answers he never knew he needed. But was she ever real? Or just a gift from the sun? A poetic journey of love, loss, and destiny.

programme.title: It's A Match!
programme.desc: Saurabh gets a match on a dating app and enlists his friend Shobhit’s help. But when Shobhit steals the spotlight—and the girl—things take a hilarious turn. Lies unravel, friendships are tested, and just when you think it's over… another match changes everything! A fun-filled tale of love, loyalty, and second chances

programme.title: O Re Saajan
programme.desc: Sajan Tiwari', in his mid 30s, works as a small time estate agent in Lucknow. He is involved in an extra-marital affair. His only son, 5 year old 'Bunty', catches him in the act. Scared out of his wits, 'Sajan' makes every possible effort to stop 'Bunty' breaking the news to his wife 'Manju'. The story is a humorous take on small town life, relationships and family.

programme.title: Ban Chor
programme.desc: A thief sneaks into a wealthy home for an easy heist—only to find the wife’s secret lover already there! But when the husband arrives, the thief and the lover must hide together, leading to a night of pure chaos, panic, and comedy. Because in this house… "Har chor pe ek mor hota hai!"

programme.title: Uljhe Ho Kyun
programme.desc: Fitness influencer Abhay’s quirky habit of messaging his first likes leads him to Srishti, a corporate workaholic. As sparks fly, their contrasting worlds collide in a playful yet unpredictable romance. Will their chemistry sizzle or turn to ashes? A fun, fiery take on modern love.

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A mother’s unwavering love gives her child the strength to face fears, embrace courage, and discover the true meaning of freedom. This inspiring tale celebrates the power of love, resilience, and the journey toward self-discovery.

programme.title: Aam Ka Achaar
programme.desc: Haunted by the riots that took his parents 20 years ago, Karan confronts the man who once loved him as a son—yet betrayed him in the worst way. Torn between revenge and forgiveness, he seeks meaning in the madness. A powerful story of loss, betrayal, and the fight for redemption.

programme.title: Bita Hua Pal
programme.desc: The film delves into the universal question of love and compatibility. It follows the journey of a woman named Mira, who, like many others, finds herself questioning the foundation of her relationship. As she navigates the ups and downs of her own love story, she reflects on the nature of love and the challenges of maintaining a lasting connection.

programme.title: Party Bhaiya Viral Hai
programme.desc: A satirical comedy on social media, Party Bhaiya follows a young man from a small village who becomes infatuated with a social media influencer through her videos. Drawn by his growing attraction, he tracks down her location to express his feelings in person. However, this encounter delivers a jarring reality check, revealing the stark differences between her online persona and real life. But in the unpredictable world of social media, surprises await, and Party Bhaiya, his online alias, learns that appearances can be deceiving.

programme.title: Makdee
programme.desc: This is the story of a woman whose captivating beauty lures men into her world, much like a spider weaving an irresistible web

programme.title: Adarniya Mantri Ji
programme.desc: In a gripping tale, Finance Minister Supriya Chaudhry leads a crackdown on black money with her secretary, Laxman. After seizing 1200 crores, they discover 600 crores are missing. Laxman uncovers a secret plan, revealing himself as the masked figure holding the bank manager hostage. As chaos ensues and the truth unfolds, Laxman informs Supriya of their covert success, leaving viewers with a tense cliff hanger. The story ends with the title Adarniya Mantri Ji, leaving the mystery unresolved.

programme.title: The Red Suitcase
programme.desc: A lone taxi driver’s quiet routine is shattered when she picks up a seemingly innocent passenger carrying a RED suitcase. What begins as a simple ride turns into a twisted journey, as the driver uncovers chilling clues hidden inside the suitcase that lead her into the dark mystery. She must navigate the gritty streets and her growing paranoia to survive a night that will change everything.

programme.title: Love Range
programme.desc: In the bustling metro city of Mumbai, Ayush and Roohi's lives are turned upside down by the COVID-19 pandemic. When Ayush loses his job, Roohi decides to start a tiffin service to support the family, but Raj's traditional views and wounded ego create tension as he struggles with the idea of his wife being the breadwinner.

programme.title: Cycle Of Sorrows
programme.desc: Set in a rural village, this heart-wrenching story follows a poor father with a beloved daughter, who still yearns for a son as his pregnant wife prepares to give birth. Driven by financial hardship, he makes a tragic decision that not only shatters his family but leaves his relationship with his daughter and wife forever scarred. Watch this emotional tale of a father’s regret and the lasting impact on his family. Can he undo the damage he’s caused?

programme.title: On The Spot
programme.desc: On a fateful day, Parul hails a taxi to visit her boyfriend Ansh. Ansh, eagerly anticipating her arrival, is thrown into restlessness. However, their journey takes an unexpected turn when the taxi driver receives news of his daughter falling ill. Witnessing this, Parul's compassionate response sparks anger in Ansh. Yet, in the face of adversity, Parul's decision unfolds, offering inspiration to the youth. This is the tale of "On the Spot."

programme.title: Ransom Handsome
programme.desc: Ayan and Kabir are small time criminals involved in the kidnapping of a daughter of a dangerous mob boss, Nicole. All they have to do is stick to a kidnapping checklist and check off items as they come to pass. But their novice actions force them to interact with Nicole. Her innocent interactions result in a significantly jacked up ransom amount. Nicole manipulates the situation. Ayan and Kabir struggle to survive as Nicole starts executing her master plan to leave no witnesses behind

programme.title: Pardesi Love
programme.desc: The central theme of "Pardesi Love" focuses on a romance involving an Indian taxi driver and a foreign woman who arrives in India from Canada to meet her online boyfriend and fulfill her mother's final rites. However, the situation is far from straightforward. Jasmin intends to wed her boyfriend, Sunny, and establish a life in India, while simultaneously, the cab driver, Satya, develops feelings for her. Yet, the complexities of their relationships and interactions form the crux of the film's narrative, showcasing the dynamic among these three individuals.

programme.title: Nazariyaa
programme.desc: Mihika, a 22 year old, fights with her dad yet again over going out late at night. She finds it very unreasonable of him to be so worried now that she’s 22. Waiting for her cab, she overhears her building’s supervisor talking on a phone call with his own daughter. She steps in and debates with him about how he shouldn’t be upset about her being out late at night but understands his perspective too in the process. She then goes back home to apologise and reconcile with her dad. The supervisor also understands his daughter’s situation better through this chance encounter.

programme.title: Ansh
programme.desc: When Nidhi visits an orphanage with hopes of adopting, she is confronted by the unresolved trauma of losing her own child to kidnapping. As she battles grief and depression, she must find a way to heal and embrace life again. A poignant tale of loss, resilience, and the power of hope.

programme.title: Share Baazaar
programme.desc: A satirical mockumentary that dives into the wild world of stock markets, where retail traders chase dreams, operators outsmart the game, and finfluencers sell hope (and courses). SHARE BAZAAR: Yahaan Sabhi Gyaani Hain is a sharp, hilarious take on the madness behind the money.

programme.title: The Moment
programme.desc: One evening, Dhirendra (40 yrs.) is eager to head home, yet the taxi driver is awaiting additional passengers. Eventually, a lone passenger arrives, prompting the taxi to proceed. As the driver requests fares and mentions a lack of change, a comedic spectacle ensues between the passengers and the driver. Ultimately, the narrative takes a humorous twist, concluding with a happy ending.

programme.title: Khwahishon Ki Car
programme.desc: A newlywed longs to drive her dowry car, but is stalled by her husband's ego and her mother-in-law’s control. The Driver’s Seat is a quiet rebellion about agency, freedom, and the fight to take control—on the road and in life.

programme.title: 23 B Raheja
programme.desc: 23B Raheja is a gripping one-night drama that peels back the glossy layers of the entertainment industry to expose the shadows lurking beneath. The story revolves around a celebrated casting director whose charm masks a long trail of manipulation and exploitation. His power begins to crumble when a young woman arrives at his door, posing as an aspiring actress—but with a haunting connection to his past. As the night unfolds, so does a tense game of revelations, where truth becomes confrontation and justice takes an unexpected form. Taut, timely, and unsettlingly real, 23B Raheja is not just a story of reckoning—it’s a mirror held up to the systems we too often ignore.

programme.title: Ghar
programme.desc: Isaac, a 15-year-old boy, is trapped in the trauma of his parents' separation, leading him to lose his passion for music. His grandmother advises him to revisit his passion and meet Naomi, a retired singer. How he finds beauty in his brokenness, follows the crux of the story.

programme.title: Barking Bruno
programme.desc: Barking Bruno sheds light on the reality of modern life, where we often prefer pets over parents, viewing them as burdens. Rohit, content with his dog Bruno, contrasts sharply with his treatment of his father, Mr. Mehra, who feels neglected. However, when Mr. Mehra meets Bruno, his life takes an unexpected turn, albeit temporarily

programme.title: Rishtey
programme.desc: Ria, a rising model, and Juhi, a top creative director, share an unbreakable bond—until ace photographer Vicky enters their lives. As passion and ambition collide, their friendship is put to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Gunjaaish
programme.desc: A heartfelt journey of a couple raising a child with autism, discovering the power of love, resilience, and community. Featuring autistic actors, this ground breaking film celebrates acceptance and the beauty of being different.

programme.title: Pendulum
programme.desc: After losing his fiancée, Vishu is drowning in grief, unable to see a way forward. On the verge of giving up, a mysterious encounter changes everything, offering him a new perspective on life. Will he embrace the second chance fate has given him?

programme.title: Hum Types
programme.desc: Charu, a girl from high society, faces her own struggles. One night, she meets Makrand, a boy from a low social class. Initially, their class difference creates a barrier, but as they spend time together, Charu realizes they share more similarities than differences. Through moments of vulnerability and connection, they discover their common humanity.

programme.title: Blame Game
programme.desc: A woman sits alone on a beach, lost in thought, until a stranger joins her, sparking a conversation that reveals a story about love, relationships, and the bitterness they can sometimes bring. She describes a once-loving bond that, over time, turned painful, leaving lasting scars.

programme.title: Passbook
programme.desc: Set in the 90's when ATM and instant money transfer were still many years far away. In order to withdraw money people had to rely on a lengthy process of MT or Money Transfer which contained a bank to bank secret code.

programme.title: L'idiot
programme.desc: L’Idiot tells the story of Rinku, a young, eccentric man who is captivated by French culture and hopelessly infatuated with Mona, a charismatic and free-spirited girl in his language class. His romantic fantasies and attempts to impress Mona take a comedic yet dark twist when he encounters a mysterious “thief,” who manipulates Rinku into a dubious scheme to win Mona’s affection. Rinku’s innocent longing for friendship and love leads him into an awkward and ultimately dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: The Perception
programme.desc: This story follows the journey of a professional photographer and a poor cycle rickshaw driver in Mumbai at the end of spring. Through various incidents on the road, their perceptions of each other change, highlighting the contrast between their social statuses. Ultimately, their experiences weave together to create a beautiful narrative of understanding and connection.

programme.title: Fried
programme.desc: In Mumbai, newlyweds Tanya and Rajat struggle after she loses her job. As financial strain and depression take a toll, their love is tested. An emotional journey of resilience, love, and the hidden impact of corporate layoffs on relationships.

programme.title: Writer
programme.desc: A quiet evening between a writer and his wife unravels into a surreal exploration of love, memory, and hidden truths. As reality shifts, so do the stories they’ve been telling themselves—and each other.

programme.title: Khayaal Rakhna
programme.desc: A senior woman grapples with dementia, compelling her husband to confront challenging choices.

programme.title: Akhiri Parchi
programme.desc: This movie serves as an inspirational tool for kids, helping them grasp the extent of their parents' sacrifices and efforts to ensure their lives are comfortable and fulfilling, despite challenging circumstances. It aims to convey a powerful message, encouraging children to maximize their available resources and strive for their best.

programme.title: Suta
programme.desc: Suta (The Daughter) is the story of a bold and smart daughter who fights for the sacrifices of her mother which went unnoticed in the family. She emerges victorious and sees that her mother gains back her confidence.

programme.title: Ahsaas
programme.desc: Ahsaas is the emotional journey of Sana, a devoted wife caught in society’s definition of a “complete woman.” As childlessness becomes a burden, her husband’s support becomes her strength—leading them to seek help and reclaim their peace, together.

programme.title: Laali (bahaar Part 02)
programme.desc: Bahaar is a haunting tale of a young bride crushed under the weight of infertility and expectations. Once cherished, she’s slowly erased—until the family finds a “solution.” A heart breaking reflection on womanhood, shame, and broken promises.

programme.title: Sita Ram Chaddha
programme.desc: Sita Ram Chaddha's married daughter has the option to seek substantial financial assistance from her affluent brother, but her unique request ends up transforming the lives of everyone involved in unexpected and remarkable ways.

programme.title: Bahaar
programme.desc: Bahaar follows a young woman’s silent suffering inside a marriage built on expectations. Her dreams fade as she’s shamed for infertility—until the family finds a “solution.” A haunting story of societal pressure, dignity, and the myth of the perfect marriage.

programme.title: Leaf
programme.desc: Raj and Neha, a newly married couple, move into a new house and soon begin sensing an eerie presence. Over time, they discover that the house is connected to their past lives, where they were caught in a karmic cycle of falling in love.

programme.title: Woh Khaas
programme.desc: A business tycoon bored with his monotonous work-life escapes from his corporate setup for a day and ends up meeting a girl, who like a dream changes him upside down in a real ‘Filmy Manner’. Woh Khaas is a jazzy tribute to Bollywood romances that tries to combine the reality of love and the flamboyance of Indian cinema in an entertaining and enriching way.

programme.title: Rangdari
programme.desc: An interrogation between a cop and a criminal turns into a pre-planned crime.

programme.title: Catharsis
programme.desc: A poignant journey of a man forced onto a path of self-discovery, exploring the depths of the human mind and spirit.

programme.title: Vansh
programme.desc: Dive into the powerful narrative of Vansh, a heartfelt short film from Vidyarthi Studios & Pocket Films, that explores the societal pressures surrounding gender expectations. This gripping tale follows a father's fierce desire for a son over his beloved daughter, shedding light on deep-seated beliefs and cultural traditions. As he grapples with his emotions, this poignant story opens a discussion about love, acceptance, and true parenthood. Don’t miss this eye-opening film that promises to challenge perceptions and evoke empathy.

programme.title: Uljhan
programme.desc: After an unresolved breakup, Kartik and Ishita reunite for one last conversation. As memories resurface, so do the feelings. But closure doesn’t always mean getting back together. Uljhan is a tender tale of emotional maturity, heartbreak, and growth.

programme.title: Broken Stars
programme.desc: An astrologer who has a fake beard is just like his profession. He is confused about the stars and how it determines anyone's future, he tricks people daily but He is worried about his daughter suffering from a disease, then one day as it happens his past somehow connects with his present which determines his future. it is a philosophical journey of a man who constantly questions the existence of sheer weirdness of the whole connection of our stars with lives and his realization

programme.title: Harela
programme.desc: A 60-year-old woman and a young man navigate tradition and modernity during the festival in Uttarakhand. Who will uphold their heritage in an evolving world?

programme.title: Raah
programme.desc: Raah is an exploration of the several stages of struggle when one steps out to pursue a dream. Sahir lives in Mumbai city with his family. The emotional and poetic narrative explores his faith, kinship and his struggle to establish himself as a poet/writer.

programme.title: The Last Date
programme.desc: A story of a husband and wife who are enjoying a romantic dinner date together that ends with a tragic climax.

programme.title: Dil
programme.desc: College sweethearts Raja & Madhu defy parents to marry. They build a happy life, but their parents persist in trying to separate them.

programme.title: Naina
programme.desc: Naina loses eyesight in a car accident. Years later, a corneal transplant gives her vision, but she sees hallucinations and another's reflection. A psychiatrist investigates, leading to a village where the donor's curse endangers her.

programme.title: Gundaraj
programme.desc: Rai Bahadur's granddaughter Pinky leaves home after a quarrel. She falls for taxi driver Govinda. Just as they're ready to live together, Rai Bahadur gets him arrested.

programme.title: Accident On Hill Road
programme.desc: Drunk Sonam hits a man, his body hitting her windshield. Fearful, she conceals the crime, forever changing her life.

programme.title: Hum Intezaar Karenge
programme.desc: Amit wants a modern wife, but his parents marry him to simple Madhuri. Amit rejects her, so Madhuri transforms her appearance and re-enters his life as Malathi.

programme.title: Aakrosh
programme.desc: Sita is tormented by in-laws and an abusive husband, who married her for revenge. Her brother-in-law Amar sympathizes, and they plan to teach the family a lesson.

programme.title: Vinashak Destroyer
programme.desc: Brave police officer Arjun goes undercover as a criminal in prison to expose jailer Lankeshwar, an illegal arms dealer. Arjun faces trouble when his ally, Inspector Amar, is murdered.

programme.title: Surkhaab
programme.desc: Former judo champion Jeet illegally migrates to Canada to visit her brother Pargat. She becomes entangled in human trafficking with no escape.

programme.title: Ghar Ek Mandir
programme.desc: Brothers Prem, Vijay, and Ravi's lives are ruined when Prem is assassinated. Vijay is blinded by love for Sapna, who is a pawn in a scheme to destroy the family.

programme.title: 50 Lakh
programme.desc: When NCB offers a prize for capturing crime kingpin Irfan Khan, he plans to hijack a plane to Kathmandu, recruiting four unsuspecting men to assist him.

programme.title: Maine Dil Tujhko Diya
programme.desc: College stud Ajay falls for business tycoon Ayesha. Her father opposes, influenced by a rival who plots Ajay's death. Ajay accepts a challenge to find Ayesha, unaware of a deeper conspiracy.

programme.title: Jajantaram Mamantaram
programme.desc: Aditya, a young man, is transported to a mystical island of miniature people. He embarks on adventures, forms friendships, confronts adversaries, and strives to find his way home.

Bachke Rehna Re Baba Bachke Rehna Re
Spytime
programme.desc: Anacleto, a former secret agent, is forced to come out of retirement and protect his son, Adolfo, when his arch-enemy, Vazquez, breaks out of prison and targets him

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Redline is an auto/action thriller that features an extensive exotic car collection Phantom Rolls Royce, Lamborghini Murcielago, Enzo Ferrari, Ferrari F430, Ferrari Scaglietti and two Mercedes SLR McLaren AMGs. The film follows a gorgeous young automobile fanaticize driver who becomes part of illegal drag racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.

programme.title: Out Of Death
programme.desc: From the producers of The Irishman & Lone Survivor comes this thrilling story of Jack Harris (Bruce Willis) who must tap into his killer instincts to survive the wilderness and the human predators as he tries to help a woman who witnesses a crime and finds herself running from a rural mountain town's corrupt police department after she took a video of police killing a drug dealer.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: We control the fear, you understand? Without the fear, we are all good as dead.’ The notorious gangster Al Capone observed that “Prohibition has made nothing but trouble,” and “I am like any other man. All I do is supply a demand.” Acclaimed director delivers a thrillingly vivid slice of American outlaw history in his epic gangster tale, LAWLESS. LAWLESS is the true story of the infamous Bondurant Brothers: three bootlegging siblings who made a run for the American Dream in Prohibition-era Virginia. The film gathers an ensemble of gifted, dynamic new-generation stars – Tom Hardy, Shia LaBeouf, Jessica Chastain, Jason Clarke, Mia Wasikowska, Dane DeHaan – alongside two of the finest actors of their generations, Guy Pearce and Gary Oldman. A riveting, intense story of Crime and Corruption, Loyalty and Love, Brutality and Tenderness, LAWLESS is a rich addition to the American Gangster Canon.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
programme.desc: Every 23rd spring for 23days, it gets to eat…Stranded on a lonely road, a school bus full of high school players must defend themselves from the Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror - ancient beast that resurfaces on the earth every 23 years to feed.

programme.title: Death Of Me
programme.desc: A vacationing couple on an island off the coast of Thailand with no memory of the previous night must discover the mystery behind a strange video that shows one of them killing the other. In a web of mystery, black magic, and murder they must attempt to reconstruct the night's events & discover is she to blame for not being sacrificed or was it Mother Nature?

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: This timeless tale was originally written in 1757. Could Beauty ever love the ghastly lord, the Beast? The year is 1810. After losing his fortune at sea, a bankrupt merchant poor father-of-six, after plucking a scented rose from the repulsive master's garden must do the impossible, permit his daughter Beauty, to take his place and pay for the parent’s sins. Only true love can break the spell.

programme.title: Aileen Wuornos: American Boogeywoman
programme.desc: True Story that follows America’s most notorious Female Serial killer. Based on Aileen Wuorno’s early life. Back in 1976 a young Aileen arrives in Florida searching for a new life, marries a wealthy yacht club president to start as part of Florida’s high society. Tormented by her inner demons she surrenders to her murderous impulses havoc in the peaceful community.

programme.title: Rememory
programme.desc: You can’t escape them. They’re everywhere. They bring tears to our eyes. They make us laugh. They bring us pain. Gordon a visionary inventor of the Rememory machine that allows him to see memories. He dies in his office. Is it murder? Sam investigates by using the machine "borrowed" from Gordon's wife. He looks at memories of others involved. REMEMORY is a noir mystery Thriller.

programme.title: Maneater
programme.desc: While the group of friends explore a beautiful small island, all hell breaks loose for Jessie as the rogue shark sets its hunting grounds within the vicinity. A Father with a score to settle brings his war to their doorstep.

programme.title: Vivarium
programme.desc: A Young couple thinking about buying their perfect single family starter home. They visits a real estate agency where they are received by a strange sales agent and find themselves trapped in a surreal, mysterious, maze-like nightmare.

programme.title: Jurassic Hunt
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding Creature thriller, Female adventurer Parker joins a crew of male trophy hunters in a remote wilderness park. Their goal: slaughter genetically recreated dinosaurs & must work together to evade the giant human-hungry creatures and mercenaries hired to finish them off. This battle's about to become primitive.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Regeneration
programme.desc: Terrorists kidnap the Russian Prime Minister's two kids, take Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant and threaten to blow up a reactor. Four Universal Soldiers go in but are no match to a Next Generation UniSol. The world's only hope is to reactivate decommissioned Universal Soldier Luc Deveraux.

programme.title: Spytime
programme.desc: Anacleto, a former secret agent, is forced to come out of retirement and protect his son, Adolfo, when his arch-enemy, Vazquez, breaks out of prison and targets him

programme.title: Out Of Death
programme.desc: From the producers of The Irishman & Lone Survivor comes this thrilling story of Jack Harris (Bruce Willis) who must tap into his killer instincts to survive the wilderness and the human predators as he tries to help a woman who witnesses a crime and finds herself running from a rural mountain town's corrupt police department after she took a video of police killing a drug dealer.
